name: Pinrut - 2D Boss Rush
description:
Pinrut is sent on a mission- destroy the beasts that threaten the idyllic nature they live in. What's a little animated turnip to do except fight?

The brainchild of: "What if we cut out all the fluff and just went straight to fighting boss after boss?"

CONTROLS:

UP ARROW or SPACE to jump or double jump

LEFT ARROW to move left

RIGHT ARROW to move right

LEFT/RIGHT ARROW while against a wall to wall jump

LEVEL SPECIFIC CONTROLS:

DOUBLE JUMP can create platforms on certain levels

DOWN ARROW can create projectiles on certain levels

JUMP ON/SHOOT objects to destroy them.
